text: (nabiyē,) paṟayuka: niṅṅaḷ cinticcu nēākkiyiṭṭuṇṭēā? it (khur'ān) allāhuvinṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷatāyirikkukayuṁ, enniṭṭ niṅṅaḷ itil aviśvasikkukayuṁ, itu pēāluḷḷatin isrāyīl santatikaḷil ninnuḷḷa oru sākṣi sākṣyaṁ vahikkukayuṁ, aṅṅane ayāḷ (itil) viśvasikkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷ ahambhāvaṁ naṭikkukayumāṇ uṇṭāyiṭṭuḷḷateṅkil (niṅṅaḷuṭe nila etra mēāśamāyirikkuṁ?) akramakārikaḷāya janaṅṅaḷe allāhu nērvaḻiyilākkukayilla; tīrcca
